doctor.name: Nishat Sharmin Nishi
doctor.degree: Bsc & MSc (Food & Nutrition) DU, MPH, CCD (DIU), CDT (DCC)
doctor.info: Nishat Sharmin Nishi is a Nutritionist in Dhaka. Her qualification is Bsc & MSc (Food & Nutrition) DU, MPH, CCD (DIU), CDT (DCC). She is the chief dietitian & head of the nutrition department at Popular Medical College & Hospital. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Dhanmondi. Practicing hour of Nishat Sharmin Nishi at Popular Diagnostic Center, Dhanmondi is 10am to 2pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dietitian Sayeda Shirina Smrity
doctor.degree: BSc & MSc (Food & Nutrition, DU), MPH (Public Health Nutrition)
doctor.specialty: Kidney Diet Management, Weight Management, Pregnancy & Children's Nutrition Specialist
doctor.info: Dietitian Sayeda Shirina Smrity is a Dietitian in Dhaka. Her qualification is BSc & MSc (Food & Nutrition, DU), MPH (Public Health Nutrition). She is a Senior Dietitian & Head, Dietetics at BRB Hospital, Dhaka. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at BRB Hospital, Dhaka. Practicing hour of Dietitian Sayeda Shirina Smrity at BRB Hospital, Dhaka is 9am to 6pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dietitian Shirajam Munira
doctor.info: Dietitian Shirajam Munira is a Dietitian in Dhaka. Her qualification is BSc & MSc (Applied Nutrition & Food Tech). She is a Consultant, Dietetics & Nutritions at Ibn Sina Medical College & Hospital. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at Ibn Sina Medical College Hospital, Kallyanpur. Practicing hour of Dietitian Shirajam Munira at Ibn Sina Medical College Hospital, Kallyanpur is 11am to 10pm (Closed: Thu & Friday).

chamber.hospital: Ibn Sina Medical College Hospital, Kallyanpur

doctor.name: Dietitian Sabeka Rahman
doctor.specialty: Weigh, Diabetes, Heart, Kidney Disease & Critical Care Management Specialist
doctor.info: Dietitian Sabeka Rahman is a Dietitian in Dhaka. Her qualification is B.Sc & M.Sc (Food & Nutrition, DU). She is a Clinical Dietitian & Nutritionist, Food and Nutrition at Lubana General Hospital, Uttara. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at Lubana General Hospital, Uttara. Practicing hour of Dietitian Sabeka Rahman at Lubana General Hospital, Uttara is 11am to 1pm (Sun, Mon, Wed & Thursday).

doctor.name: Dietician Sanzida Sharmeen
doctor.info: Dietician Sanzida Sharmeen is a Dietician & Nutritionist in Dhaka. Her qualification is BSc & MSc in Food & Nutrition (DU), Special training on Diabetic Diet & GDM Diet (BUHS), PGT on Weight Management & Diet for Kidney Disease (India), PGT on Autism Nutrition & Onco-Nutrition (BADN). She is a Ex. Senior Clinical Dietician (Dietetics & Nutrition Department) at United Hospital Limited, Dhaka. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at Labaid Diagnostic, Uttara (Unit 01). Practicing hour of Dietician Sanzida Sharmeen at Labaid Diagnostic, Uttara (Unit 01) is 10am to 2pm (Sat to Mon), 4pm to 5pm (Tue to Thu).

chamber.visitingTime: 10am to 2pm (Sat to Mon), 4pm to 5pm (Tue to Thu)

doctor.name: Nutritionist Khaleda Khatun
doctor.workplace: Birdem General Hospital & Ibrahim Medical College
doctor.info: Nutritionist Khaleda Khatun is an experienced Nutritionist and Dietician in Dhaka with academic credentials including BSc in Food & Nutrition, MSc in Nutrition from Dhaka University, and MPH. She currently serves as the Chief Nutrition Officer at Birdem General Hospital & Ibrahim Medical College. Khaleda Khatun provides expert dietary management and nutrition counseling for diseases like diabetes, obesity, kidney diseases, heart diseases, digestive problems, malnutrition, and hormonal disorders. She attends patients at the BIRDEM Specialized Chamber Complex, located at Main Building, 122, Kazi Nazrul Islam Avenue, Shahbag, Dhaka, with visiting hours from 4pm to 6pm, closed on Fridays.

chamber.address: Main Building, 122, Kazi Nazrul Islam Avenue, Shahbag, Dhaka
